name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】さくらみこ1st Live ＂flower fantasista!＂【#咲き誇るみこち】 [mVmWmkHltak]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Sakura Kaze' concludes, followed by a transition shout to the audience.
Energetic performance of 'Nyahallo World!' with elaborate stage effects and on-screen graphics.
MC section where Sakura Miko greets the live audience and the online viewers, expressing her excitement.

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: 最後まで見逃すなよ！
subtitles.english: Don't miss a thing until the very end!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がって行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's get fired up!

subtitles.original: にゃっはろーわーるど さぁ行こう
subtitles.english: Nyahallo World, let's go!

subtitles.original: エリートと舐めんないざ登壇
subtitles.english: Don't look down on an elite, entering the stage now

subtitles.original: みこち！みこち！
subtitles.english: Mikochi! Mikochi!

subtitles.original: 配信だけじゃもう集まれーい！
subtitles.english: Gather up, not just for the stream!

subtitles.original: 102まで愛を叫んで育ってこのアホ毛
subtitles.english: Screaming love until 102, grow this ahoge

subtitles.original: ついに来たぞ 有明アリーナ！
subtitles.english: We finally made it, Ariake Arena!

subtitles.original: 会場のみんなも 画面の前のみんなも
subtitles.english: Everyone in the venue, everyone in front of the screen

subtitles.original: 全員声出していけー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, let me hear your voices!

subtitles.original: わがった、わがんないの繰り返し
subtitles.english: Repeating "I get it", "I don't get it"

subtitles.original: ケチャして行くぜ ポジな人生
subtitles.english: Cheering with Kecha, a positive life

subtitles.original: エリートな目論見外れるんで あんたらの顔前立って未来
subtitles.english: Elite plans go awry, standing before your faces, the future

subtitles.original: デモレカトカをしてんのね そんなこんちゃ
subtitles.english: I'm doing a demo or whatever, that's what's up

subtitles.original: 今に見てろ咲きそうなのね アニメーションやアップパンチ
subtitles.english: Just you wait, I'm about to bloom, animation or up-punch

subtitles.original: 全人類盛り上がって はばたくバタフライ
subtitles.english: All humanity, get hyped! Fluttering butterfly

subtitles.original: 毎日バラ色見い出した 100人が無限色だ
subtitles.english: Finding rosy days every day, 100 people are infinite colors

subtitles.original: にゃっはろーわーるど さぁ行こう 水平線突き上げろ
subtitles.english: Nyahallo World, let's go! Thrust up the horizon

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: キミにはキミの乳酸菌載せて
subtitles.english: Carrying your own lactic acid bacteria

subtitles.original: にゃっはろーわーるど さぁ行こう エリートと舐めんないざ登壇
subtitles.english: Nyahallo World, let's go! Don't look down on an elite, entering the stage now

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 配信だけじゃもう集まれ
subtitles.english: Gather up, not just for the stream

subtitles.original: 白熱まで想いを燃やして つたえに地上中
subtitles.english: Burning thoughts until white heat, spreading all over the world

subtitles.original: 届かなくたって頑張るから
subtitles.english: I'll do my best even if it doesn't reach

subtitles.original: 光ってほら虹色だね 一途なマイスタイル
subtitles.english: Look, it's shining in rainbow colors. My single-minded style.

subtitles.original: みこみこにー！
subtitles.english: Miko Miko Ni!

subtitles.original: アイエンビーシー 十五円ねえ こんちあーじゃん！我ら三身
subtitles.english: I-N-V-C, 15 yen, right? Konchi-ah, right? We are three bodies

subtitles.original: 恩年全開 パンデミック悩み越くって頭もポンにして
subtitles.english: Full age at full throttle, pandemic! Get over your worries and make your head 'pon' too

subtitles.original: めげないしょげない 痛くないね 荒んた世の中も諦めんな
subtitles.english: Don't be discouraged, don't be downcast, it doesn't hurt. Don't give up on this desolate world.

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: 右見て左見て 個性残してみない？
subtitles.english: Looking right, looking left, why not leave your individuality?

subtitles.original: これが王座のホルモン 撒き散らせ
subtitles.english: This is the hormone of the throne, spread it around

subtitles.original: テコ入れ人生無茶苦種で 猛攻で馬鹿だね
subtitles.english: Revised life is a mess, a relentless onslaught, how foolish

subtitles.original: 全人類盛り上がって はばたくバタフライ
subtitles.english: All humanity, get hyped! Fluttering butterfly

subtitles.original: 咲かせた曲がり角 導き出そう 今人生真っ只中
subtitles.english: The corner where we bloomed, let's lead the way. Now in the middle of life.

subtitles.original: あしたもうたおう この場所 寂しい思いさせないよ
subtitles.english: Let's sing tomorrow too, in this place. I won't let you feel lonely.

subtitles.original: みこ田みこPみんなで作る 独壇場なんで！
subtitles.english: Miko-ta, Miko-P, everyone making it, because it's our specialty!

subtitles.original: にゃっはろーわーるど さぁ行こう ちっちゃい体声上げろ
subtitles.english: Nyahallo World, let's go! Small body, raise your voice!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 汗もしたたる いい女なんで
subtitles.english: Because I'm a fine woman, even dripping with sweat

subtitles.original: にゃっはろーわーるど さぁ行こう エリートと舐めんないざ登壇
subtitles.english: Nyahallo World, let's go! Don't look down on an elite, entering the stage now

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 配信だけじゃもう集まれ
subtitles.english: Gather up, not just for the stream

subtitles.original: 白熱まで騒ごうわらって 痛めねぇ感情
subtitles.english: Let's make a fuss until white heat, laughing, feelings that don't hurt

subtitles.original: もっと遊んでごめん越しだって ハイタッチめちゃくちゃ笑ったっていいから
subtitles.english: Play more, even if it's over an apology. High-fives, it's okay to laugh like crazy.

subtitles.original: 光ってほら虹色だね 一途なマイスタイル
subtitles.english: Look, it's shining in rainbow colors. My single-minded style.

subtitles.original: 一緒に行こう ひとりとずっとな名前呼ぶよ
subtitles.english: Let's go together. I'll call out each and every name forever.

subtitles.original: サンキュー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: わぁー... はぁ、はぁ... みんなー！
subtitles.english: Wow... *panting* Everyone!

subtitles.original: 挨拶行きますよー！
subtitles.english: Here comes the greeting!

subtitles.original: にゃっはろぉぉぉー！
subtitles.english: Nyahallooooo!

subtitles.original: はい！ということでね、35P、みこと一緒に有明来たぞー！
subtitles.english: Yes! So, 35P, I came to Ariake with Miko!

subtitles.original: いやちょっと、みんなの声がすごすぎる。
subtitles.english: Wow, everyone's voices are too much.

subtitles.original: まじで、みんなの声が、すごーいぞー！
subtitles.english: Seriously, everyone's voices are amazing!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、さくらみこ 1stソロライブ
subtitles.english: Yes! So, Sakura Miko's 1st Solo Live

subtitles.original: 「flower fantasista!」が始まりましたー！
subtitles.english: "flower fantasista!" has begun!

subtitles.original: みんな、来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for coming!

subtitles.original: 後ろのみんなも見えてるよね？
subtitles.english: I can see everyone in the back too, right?

subtitles.original: 見えてるよ！見えてるよ！
subtitles.english: I see you! I see you!
